net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.visualattention
Class StentifordModel

java.lang.Object
  net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.visualattention.StentifordModel

public class StentifordModel
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a visual attention model described in F. W. M. Stentiford, An estimator for visual attention through competitive novelty with application to image compression, Proc. Picture Coding Symposium, pp 101-104, Seoul, 24-27 April, 2001.

Author:
Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at, http://www.semanticmetadata.net Date: 22.03.2010 Time: 15:52:24

Constructor Detail

StentifordModel

public StentifordModel(int neighbourhoodSize,
                       int maxChecks,
                       int maxDist)
Constructor for advance use. Instead of using the default values they can be set.

Parameters:
neighbourhoodSize - number of pixels selected from the neighbourhood
maxChecks - number of random checks for each pixels, according to the paper 100 should work fine.
maxDist - the maximum distance between colors to be deemed similar

StentifordModel

public StentifordModel()
Default constructor with default values.

getAttentionModel

public int[][] getAttentionModel()

getAttentionVisualization

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getAttentionVisualization()
Visualizes the attention model in a picture. Lighter pixels are the ones with more attention.

Returns:
an image visualizing the attention model

                           int g,

                           int[] hsv)
